page.title: 15Farms in our area
page.content: Our area is mainly arable farmland. We visited 10 of the farms. These ranged from a smaller farm of 10 acres to a larger farm of 412 acres. The majority of the farms grow wheat as their main crop, but they also grow barley, oil seed rape and potatoes. Some farms grow fruit and allow the public to "Pick your own". The soil type is chalky boulder clay, and the average field size is 20 to 25 acres. Most of the farms have full time and part time employees. A few of the farms have livestock ie cattle, sheep and poultry. The farms produce straw bales for their own use. Many of the fields have names and are separated by ditches and fences. Most of the farms have ponds and a few have streams or a river flowing through their land. The plant and wildlife is in abundance on all the farms.
